text: @MollyMcKew @sclayton97 Please retweet. This congressional candidate is disseminating misinformation about #COVIDー19 #coronavirus #COVID19Pandemic asking people to go out and film their hospitals as proof there is no pandemic. Very unethical & irresponsible. Look for Filmyourhospital hashtag. https://t.co/eTVcxlDcZY

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
